articles.author: Chris Cwik
articles.title: Women's College World Series: Texas Tech walks off vs. Oklahoma, Texas blanks Tennessee to advance to finals - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Texas Tech and Texas will face each other for the Women's College World Series championship after victories over Oklahoma and Tennessee, respectively.
articles.content: The Women's College World Series will have an all-Texas final with Texas Tech and Texas each winning on Monday to avoid playing a second game and facing elimination. Tennessee was eliminated with the… [+5095 chars]

articles.title: Exercise improves colon cancer survival, high-quality trial finds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Any type of aerobic exercise works for the improvements, study finds.

articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Microsoft Bing gets a free Sora-powered AI video generator - TechCrunch
articles.description: For the first time, OpenAI's Sora video generator will be available for free as it comes to the Microsoft Bing app.
articles.content:
Microsoft Bing announced Monday that it is introducing the Bing Video Creator to its app, which uses OpenAI’s Sora model to let users generate videos from text prompts.
OpenAI, which has a long-stan… [+1131 chars]
